name: Starlight Summons
prerequisiteFormula: @feat:spell_focus#conjuration AND (@spell:summon_natures_ally_1 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_2 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_3 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_4 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_5 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_6 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_7 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_8 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_9)
descriptionText: Your summoned minions slink along under the shadows of the stars.
